title: React Development
tagline: A high-performance React application built for scale
description: Built a complex React application with custom hooks, state management, and seamless API integration. The project featured real-time data updates, advanced filtering, and a component-driven architecture that made the codebase easy to maintain and extend.
highlights: Custom hook library for reusable business logic
Real-time data synchronization with WebSockets
Optimized rendering with React.memo and useMemo
Comprehensive unit and integration test coverage
challenge: The client needed a dashboard that could handle thousands of real-time data points without performance degradation, while remaining intuitive for non-technical users.
solution: We implemented virtualized lists, debounced state updates, and a smart caching layer that reduced API calls by 60%. The UI was designed with progressive disclosure to keep the interface clean.

title: App Design & Development
tagline: End-to-end mobile app from concept to App Store
description: Designed and developed a cross-platform mobile application from the ground up. The project spanned user research, wireframing, high-fidelity design, and full development with React Native, delivering a polished product ready for both iOS and Android stores.
highlights: Cross-platform React Native codebase for iOS & Android
Offline-first architecture with local data persistence
Push notifications and in-app messaging system
Smooth 60fps animations and gesture-driven navigation
challenge: The client wanted a single codebase that felt truly native on both platforms, with offline capabilities for users in areas with spotty connectivity.
solution: We used React Native with platform-specific components where needed, AsyncStorage for offline data, and a background sync queue that reconciled data when connectivity returned.

title: Course Website
tagline: A modern e-learning platform with video streaming
description: Developed a comprehensive e-learning platform featuring video streaming, course progress tracking, quizzes, certificates, and a full payment integration. The admin dashboard allows instructors to manage content, track analytics, and communicate with students.
highlights: Adaptive video streaming with multiple quality levels
Interactive quizzes with instant feedback and scoring
Automated certificate generation upon course completion
Instructor analytics dashboard with revenue tracking
challenge: Building a platform that could handle concurrent video streams while maintaining fast page loads and a smooth user experience across all devices.
solution: We implemented HLS video streaming with adaptive bitrate, edge caching for static assets, and a microservices architecture that separated video processing from the main application server.

title: Magazine App
tagline: A beautifully crafted digital magazine experience
description: Designed a premium digital magazine application with immersive reading experiences, dynamic layouts, and gesture-driven navigation. The design focused on typography, whitespace, and visual storytelling to create an experience that felt as luxurious as print.
highlights: Magazine-quality typography and layout system
Swipe-based navigation with parallax transitions
Dark and light reading modes with auto-switching
Bookmark, highlight, and share functionality
challenge: Recreating the premium feel of a print magazine in a digital format while ensuring the experience was smooth on both high-end and mid-range devices.
solution: We developed a custom layout engine that dynamically adjusted content flow based on screen size, used Lottie for micro-animations, and implemented progressive image loading for visually rich pages.

title: Crypto App Development
tagline: Real-time crypto tracking and portfolio management
description: Built a comprehensive cryptocurrency tracking and portfolio management application with real-time price feeds, interactive charts, portfolio analytics, and secure wallet integration. The app processes thousands of data points per second while maintaining a responsive interface.
highlights: Real-time price tracking with WebSocket feeds
Interactive candlestick and line charts with zoom
Portfolio performance analytics and P&L tracking
Two-factor authentication and encrypted storage
challenge: Processing high-frequency real-time data feeds while keeping the UI responsive, and ensuring rock-solid security for financial data.
solution: We implemented a WebSocket gateway with Redis pub/sub for efficient data distribution, Web Workers for off-thread chart calculations, and a multi-layered security architecture with encryption at rest and in transit.
